title: Biotech Exploration: Challenge-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computational skills and understanding of fundamental biology concepts
context.additional_context: Students engage in individual and collaborative tasks on the LMS platform using digital devices, focusing on mathematical modeling for solving biotechnology problems

learning_goals: Can convert real-world biotechnology problems into mathematical models and propose three or more solution strategies
Can use data analysis tools to visualize experimental results as graphs and interpret trends
Can collaborate with team members to document and submit a portfolio of the process for solving complex problems
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
